des: You will be presented daily with tips and tricks on email marketing. If you develop this skillset you can write high converting emails, learn about the email infrastructure for better inboxing. Emails have a larger reach and is the most cheaper form of marketing. Email is the preferred communication channel and multiplies your ROI.
